name: Science, Sorcery and Strength
description:
This is a place full of Science, Sorcery and Strength!

A world full of choices and consequences.

You choose what your character looks like.
You choose what skills your characters has.
You choose what you say in every conversation.
You want to be nice, be nice.
You want to be bad, be bad.
You want to chat people up, go for it.
You want to kill them, try it.
It's up to you.
Do what you want.
See what happens.

Want to be a man who runs around in red stilettos and a pink dress, shooting Whirlwinds and throwing Petrol Bombs, while wielding a Laser Gun in one hand and a Boomerang in the other? Do it!
Want to be a woman who can summon the Seven Seas, hurl  Nukes and swing a Giant Sword in Full Plate Armour while wearing a sparkling Tiara and Wellies? Now's your chance!

Over 100 different skills to pick and choose from.
No class restrictions. No weapon, armour or skill restrictions; make what you want, be what you want.

You could finish the game in 5 minutes or you could finish it in 5 hours. Multiple endings, with an accurate, unique scoring system; how many points will you end with?

Meet lots of unique and exciting NPCs.
Or don't.
It's up to you if you want to talk to people.
It's up to you if you want to solo the game.
It is your game and you can play it any way you want to.

A full, interactive, open world environment, with multiple ways to complete quests, puzzles and challenges.

It could be a once in a lifetime adventure, or maybe not, I don't know, It's up to you...
It's all up to you.

All of Act one is ready to be explored.

Any feedback at all is very welcome!

(This is my first Demo Build so more will be added.)
